oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Postcard titled "The Kaiser's Nightmare"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: British propaganda postcard depicting the Royal Navy as the Kaiser's nightmare. The postcard is addressed to "Miss A. Singles / 27 Church St. / Rugby" and is inscribed, "War with Germany Sept. 1914." Kaiser Wilhelm II was the ruler of Germany. The British Royal Navy enjoyed a long tradition of being the defenders of the island nation dating back to the repulse of the Spanish Armada and Lord Nelson's defeat of the French at Trafalgar.
